parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The ID of the request source. Set the value to **sas**.

parameters.name: LogStore
parameters.description:
The name of the dedicated Logstore in which logs are stored.

>  You can call the [DescribeLogMeta](~~DescribeLogMeta~~) operation to query the names of Logstores.

parameters.name: Project
parameters.description:
The name of the project.

>  You can call the [DescribeLogMeta](~~DescribeLogMeta~~) operation to query the names of projects.

parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryAccountId
parameters.description:
The Alibaba Cloud account ID of the member in the resource directory.

>  You can call the [DescribeMonitorAccounts](~~DescribeMonitorAccounts~~) operation to obtain the IDs.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the log analysis feature. Valid values:

*   **enabled**
*   **disabled**
